thread.title: Paris Circa 1910
thread.title_full: Paris Circa 1910 - Review of Le Dokhan’s, a Tribute Portfolio Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: allyson7
title: Paris Circa 1910
text:
We had an overnight stay in Paris so we only had time to visit the Eiffel Tower. This hotel is conveniently located 2 blocks away in a beautiful neighbourhood. The hotel features the first champagne bar in Paris in its original setting. The rooms were gorgeous and well presented. The staff topnotch. I was a little leary of the original elevator as the doors were unpredictable. However, it is done in the style of a Louis Vitton Steamer Trunk and complimented the original features of the hotel. Highly recommend, even for a longer stay as you can easily access the hop and go boat along the Seine.
Room Tip: Higher floors have wonderful views with french balconies. See more room tips
